ops.description: Bank[6][1] = getLastFieldMapId(); // wm does not count
fadeScreen({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:0, type:0}); // unused=0
fade({r:255, g:255, b:255, speed:8, type:5, adjust:255});

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:42}); // {Cloud}
“Yeah, I guess so…
Come on, {Tifa}.
Let's go home…”
fadeScreen({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:0, type:5}); // unused=0

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:2}); // “…A sealed up
secret…wish…”{PAUSE}“Tender memories…
no one can ever know.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:1}); // “A promise under a starry sky…
But what if that was just a
memory {Tifa} imagined?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:12}); // “…I was devastated.
…I wanted to be noticed.”{PAUSE}“I thought if I got stronger
someone would notice.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:3}); // “You mean that member of SOLDIER who came
with Sephiroth to Nibelheim
wasn't {Cloud}?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:11}); // “…I was devastated.
…I wanted to be noticed.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:14}); // “Who?
You know who!
*
…You, that's who.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:34}); // {Tifa}
“Oh, {Cloud}!
It's really you, isn't it?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:20}); // “No…it's all right.
You were having a hard time back then.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:21}); // “You were so busy with your own things,
it's only natural
you don't remember me then.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:23}); // “It's important to me…
I hate to say it, but
it's a very important memory.”
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:24}); // “Do you want to see it?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:29}); // “Then…this is goodbye, {Tifa}.
4
Until we meet again…”

dialogStrings:
“A promise under a starry sky…
But what if that was just a
memory {Tifa} imagined?”

“A promise under a starry sky…
But what if that was just a
memory {Tifa} imagined?”

“…A sealed up
secret…wish…”{PAUSE}“Tender memories…
no one can ever know.”

“You mean that member of SOLDIER who came
with Sephiroth to Nibelheim
wasn't {Cloud}?”

{Tifa}
“{Cloud}, what about
your other memories?”

{Tifa}
“No, not memories.”{PAUSE}“A memory is something that is
consciously recalled, right?”{PAUSE}“That's why sometimes it can be
mistaken or wrong.”

{Tifa}
“It's different from a memory
locked deep within your heart.”{PAUSE}“That's why it must be a fake.
If he could recall up that memory…”

{Tifa}
“That's it! What about some memory
that has to do with me?”

{Tifa}
“If I say something, you can't remember it.”{PAUSE}“But if you say something,
and I remember it, too…
Then we'll know that's a memory.”

{Tifa}
“Talk to me.
About anything,
some important memory to you…”

{Tifa}
“Now that you mention it, why did you
want to join SOLDIER in the first place?”{PAUSE}“I always thought it was a
sudden decision.”

“…I was devastated.
…I wanted to be noticed.”

“…I was devastated.
…I wanted to be noticed.”{PAUSE}“I thought if I got stronger
someone would notice.”

{Tifa}
“Someone to notice you?
…Who?”

“Who?
You know who!
*
…You, that's who.”
“You…”

{Tifa}
“Me? Why!?”

“{Tifa}…Did you forget…
about those days?”

{Tifa}
“Look…I…”

{Tifa}
“I'm sorry…
But what are you talking about?”

“No…it's all right.
You were having a hard time back then.”

“You were so busy with your own things,
it's only natural
you don't remember me then.”

{Tifa}
“'Then'?”

“It's important to me…
I hate to say it, but
it's a very important memory.”
“Do you want to see it?”

{Tifa}
“Oh…wait!”
“Come on, hurry.”

“Do you know where this window
goes to, {Tifa}?”{PAUSE}“Fine…I'll go.”

{Tifa}
“{Cloud}.”

“Then…this is goodbye, {Tifa}.
4
Until we meet again…”

{Cloud}
“Uh…
* Ah, uh…”

{Tifa}
“{Cloud}!!”

{Cloud}
“Uh…
% {Tifa}…”

{Tifa}
“Oh, {Cloud}!
It's really you, isn't it?”

{Cloud}
“Yeah…{Tifa}…
We finally…meet again…”

{Tifa}
“You stupid jerk!!
You had us all worried sick!!”

{Cloud}
“Krgh!”

{Tifa}
“{Cloud}!?
Are you all right!?”

{Cloud}
“V, voice…their…”

{Tifa}
“I see. We're…
in the Lifestream, aren't we?”

{Tifa}
“Everyone's waiting.”{PAUSE}“Let's go back, {Cloud}.
Back to everyone…”

{Cloud}
“Yeah, I guess so…
Come on, {Tifa}.
Let's go home…”
